html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-11872023-12-01TC, LAB, NRCAN
ActArctic Waters Pollution Prevention Act
Canada Labour Code
Canada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectVessel Construction and Equipment Regulations
PrecisVESSEL CONSTRUCTION AND EQUIPMENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) consolidate requirements found in eight existing regulations into one regulation with respect to the construction and equipment of new vessels 24 metres or more in length; (2) incorporate by reference the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea, as well as codes, resolutions, circulars and recognized organization rules; (3) align domestic requirements with international requirements with respect to structural strength, stability, machinery, electrical systems, lifesaving equipment, crew accommodations, and fire protection; (4) include new penalties for non-compliance with the Regulations; and (5) make consequential amendments to nine other regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0257 Publication Date: 2023-12-20
AttachmentsAttachment
